name: The hidden path to spring
description:
Endless furious action, a sea of blood, sex and extreme ... 

this is absolutely not in this game! 

And any addictive gameplay too.

 I just did what I already knew and what I could find. In truth, we started this jam with a friend. But on day 3 he gave up. Therefore, take this game as a story. The story of a tourist first walking along an unknown path for him. The main thing is not to give up and get to the end. We must not wait for the thaw, but go to it. Because otherwise it is impossible to find out what is hidden under the snow.

In any case, I am glad that I participated in the jam! Hope you enjoy the visual style.

PS: Etti can be shot (but difficult)
